title: Quiz-App
description: An MCQ quiz web app with CRUD functionality and dynamic quiz creation, including post-quiz analysis for user feedback on performance.

title: Vaccine-Bank
description: A Blockchain-based vaccine authorization system enabling cryptocurrency transactions, automatic ownership transfer, and unique IDs for sellers and buyers.

title: Task-Tracker
description: A high-performance management app with Vue.js and Spring Boot, enhancing task management efficiency, user experience, and security for all active users.
